name: conjneg_apply
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f : G → R
x : G
⊢ Eq (conjneg f x) ((starRingEnd R) (f (Neg.neg x)))
decl: @[simp] lemma conjneg_apply (f : G → R) (x : G) : conjneg f x = conj (f (-x)) := rfl

name: conjneg_conjneg
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f : G → R
⊢ Eq (conjneg (conjneg f)) f
decl: @[simp] lemma conjneg_conjneg (f : G → R) : conjneg (conjneg f) = f := by ext; simp

name: conjneg_involutive
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
⊢ Function.Involutive conjneg
decl: lemma conjneg_involutive : Involutive (conjneg : (G → R) → G → R) := conjneg_conjneg

name: conjneg_bijective
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
⊢ Function.Bijective conjneg
decl: lemma conjneg_bijective : Bijective (conjneg : (G → R) → G → R) := conjneg_involutive.bijective

name: conjneg_injective
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
⊢ Function.Injective conjneg
decl: lemma conjneg_injective : Injective (conjneg : (G → R) → G → R) := conjneg_involutive.injective

name: conjneg_surjective
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
⊢ Function.Surjective conjneg
decl: lemma conjneg_surjective : Surjective (conjneg : (G → R) → G → R) := conjneg_involutive.surjective

name: conjneg_inj
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f g : G → R
⊢ Iff (Eq (conjneg f) (conjneg g)) (Eq f g)
decl: @[simp] lemma conjneg_inj : conjneg f = conjneg g ↔ f = g := conjneg_injective.eq_iff

name: conjneg_ne_conjneg
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f g : G → R
⊢ Iff (Ne (conjneg f) (conjneg g)) (Ne f g)
decl: lemma conjneg_ne_conjneg : conjneg f ≠ conjneg g ↔ f ≠ g := conjneg_injective.ne_iff

name: conjneg_conj
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f : G → R
⊢ Eq (conjneg ((starRingEnd (G → R)) f)) ((starRingEnd (G → R)) (conjneg f))
decl: @[simp] lemma conjneg_conj (f : G → R) : conjneg (conj f) = conj (conjneg f) := rfl

name: conjneg_zero
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
⊢ Eq (conjneg 0) 0
decl: @[simp] lemma conjneg_zero : conjneg (0 : G → R) = 0 := by ext; simp

name: conjneg_one
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
⊢ Eq (conjneg 1) 1
decl: @[simp] lemma conjneg_one : conjneg (1 : G → R) = 1 := by ext; simp

name: conjneg_add
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f g : G → R
⊢ Eq (conjneg (HAdd.hAdd f g)) (HAdd.hAdd (conjneg f) (conjneg g))
decl: @[simp] lemma conjneg_add (f g : G → R) : conjneg (f + g) = conjneg f + conjneg g := by ext; simp

name: conjneg_mul
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f g : G → R
⊢ Eq (conjneg (HMul.hMul f g)) (HMul.hMul (conjneg f) (conjneg g))
decl: @[simp] lemma conjneg_mul (f g : G → R) : conjneg (f * g) = conjneg f * conjneg g := by ext; simp

name: conjneg_sum
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
s : Finset ι
f : ι → G → R
⊢ Eq (conjneg (s.sum fun i => f i)) (s.sum fun i => conjneg (f i))
decl:
@[simp] lemma conjneg_sum (s : Finset ι) (f : ι → G → R) :
    conjneg (∑ i ∈ s, f i) = ∑ i ∈ s, conjneg (f i) := by ext; simp

name: conjneg_prod
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
s : Finset ι
f : ι → G → R
⊢ Eq (conjneg (s.prod fun i => f i)) (s.prod fun i => conjneg (f i))
decl:
@[simp] lemma conjneg_prod (s : Finset ι) (f : ι → G → R) :
    conjneg (∏ i ∈ s, f i) = ∏ i ∈ s, conjneg (f i) := by ext; simp

name: conjneg_eq_zero
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f : G → R
⊢ Iff (Eq (conjneg f) 0) (Eq f 0)
decl:
@[simp] lemma conjneg_eq_zero : conjneg f = 0 ↔ f = 0 := by
  rw [← conjneg_inj, conjneg_conjneg, conjneg_zero]

name: conjneg_eq_one
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f : G → R
⊢ Iff (Eq (conjneg f) 1) (Eq f 1)
decl:
@[simp] lemma conjneg_eq_one : conjneg f = 1 ↔ f = 1 := by
  rw [← conjneg_inj, conjneg_conjneg, conjneg_one]

name: conjneg_ne_zero
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f : G → R
⊢ Iff (Ne (conjneg f) 0) (Ne f 0)
decl: lemma conjneg_ne_zero : conjneg f ≠ 0 ↔ f ≠ 0 := conjneg_eq_zero.not

name: conjneg_ne_one
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f : G → R
⊢ Iff (Ne (conjneg f) 1) (Ne f 1)
decl: lemma conjneg_ne_one : conjneg f ≠ 1 ↔ f ≠ 1 := conjneg_eq_one.not

name: sum_conjneg
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝³ : AddGroup G
inst✝² : CommSemiring R
inst✝¹ : StarRing R
inst✝ : Fintype G
f : G → R
⊢ Eq (Finset.univ.sum fun a => conjneg f a) (Finset.univ.sum fun a => (starRingEnd R) (f a))
decl:
lemma sum_conjneg [Fintype G] (f : G → R) : ∑ a, conjneg f a = ∑ a, conj (f a) :=
  Fintype.sum_equiv (Equiv.neg _) _ _ fun _ ↦ rfl

name: support_conjneg
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f : G → R
⊢ Eq (Function.support (conjneg f)) (Neg.neg (Function.support f))
decl:
@[simp] lemma support_conjneg (f : G → R) : support (conjneg f) = -support f := by
  ext; simp [starRingEnd_apply]

name: conjnegRingHom_apply
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f : G → R
a✝ : G
⊢ Eq (conjnegRingHom f a✝) (conjneg f a✝)
decl:
/-- `conjneg` bundled as a ring homomorphism. -/
@[simps] def conjnegRingHom : (G → R) →+* (G → R) where
  toFun := conjneg
  map_zero' := conjneg_zero
  map_one' := conjneg_one
  map_add' := conjneg_add
  map_mul' := conjneg_mul

name: conjneg_sub
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f g : G → R
⊢ Eq (conjneg (HSub.hSub f g)) (HSub.hSub (conjneg f) (conjneg g))
decl: @[simp] lemma conjneg_sub (f g : G → R) : conjneg (f - g) = conjneg f - conjneg g := by ext; simp

name: conjneg_neg
initialProofState:
G : Type u_2
R : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddGroup G
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : StarRing R
f : G → R
⊢ Eq (conjneg (Neg.neg f)) (Neg.neg (conjneg f))
decl: @[simp] lemma conjneg_neg (f : G → R) : conjneg (-f) = -conjneg f := by ext; simp
